title: [Whistler's Pass, Road]
description: The road heads up the steep hillside to the northeast.  Ancient runes can barely be seen in the stones.  A pattern of small shrubs line the cobblestone border at regular intervals.

The road heads up the steep hillside to the northeast.  Ancient runes can barely be seen in the stones.  A pattern of small shrubs line the cobblestone border at regular intervals.  Off to one side of the road, a guard tower sits behind high stone walls.

The road heads up the steep hillside to the northeast.  Ancient runes have been carved into some of the stones.  A pattern of small shrubs line the cobblestone border at regular intervals.  Off to one side of the road, a guard tower sits behind high stone walls.
